thread.title: Phillip
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Phillip

author: Phillip
title: Phillip
text: The individual who contacted me was very professional and knowledgeable. He kept me informed of each step and never left me on hold for an extended period of time. The entire process was no nonsense but he also responded to my small talk without any attitude. Very enjoyable process.
